attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1.Review of family law resolution guidelines.
2.Stricter policing of lawyers practising family law and promoting themselves as "resolution" lawyers.
3. Greater barometer measures of conflict within domestic disputes with firmer guidelines on resolutions and on amounts to be spent by both parties in the marital conflict with the desired effect of preventing the legal profession capatilising on vulnerable families.
4.Greater restrictive powers for one party to exercise power over the other and/or family by using wealth as a means of gaining control or resolution.
